title: Sending a ticket via SMS in THS
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in with edit privileges in the Ticket Holder Support Tool
And I am viewing the list of individual ticket rows
custom_steps:
click the arrow under View Tickets for specific ticket
select the "Message a tickets(s)" option under Action
enter the mobile phone number of the recipient
custom_expected:
Then the text entry field should validate the phone number format
And an error message is displayed if an incorrect phone number format is entered
Then the confirmation modal step 2 should include the necessary content and dialog mock-up for the forwarded ticket
And a "success" message is displayed with the transmitted ticket URL
And the success message disappears on page refresh and becomes irretrievable

title: Handling tickets with different deliveryIDs
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in with edit privileges in the Ticket Holder Support Tool
And I am viewing the list of individual ticket rows
custom_steps:
When I select a ticket with a specific deliveryID to send via SMS
And I attempt to select another ticket with a different deliveryID
custom_expected:
Then the ticket with the different deliveryID should be visually indicated as un-selectable (e.g., grayed out or inactive)
And a user-friendly message is displayed to inform that 'The Message a Ticket Feature only works for Tickets with the same DeliveryID'.

title: Error handling
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in with edit privileges in the Ticket Holder Support Tool
And I am viewing the list of individual ticket rows
custom_steps: When I attempt to forward too many (25 plus) ticket IDs simultaneously
custom_expected:
Then an appropriate error message is displayed to indicate the limitation
"Only 25 text messages are allowed every 24 hours to one phone number","error":"Too Many Requests"}"

title: Invalid phone number entry
custom_preconds:
Given I am logged in with edit privileges in the Ticket Holder Support Tool
And I am viewing the list of individual ticket rows
custom_steps:
When I select the "Message a Ticket(s)" option to forward a ticket
And I enter an invalid phone number.
custom_expected: Then an error message is displayed stating "Enter a valid 10 digit phone number".
